name: Notice.AAA6.ClaimIssue.HWF.FullRemission
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been approved
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd wedi cael ei gymeradwyo
descriptionEn: The full claim fee of ${claimFee} will be covered by fee remission. You do not need to make a payment.
descriptionCy: Bydd ffi lawn yr hawliad o ${claimFee} yn cael ei ddileu. Nid oes angen i chi wneud taliad.
